data.title: GraceCity
data.meta_description: Thank you for visiting GraceCity online. We look forward to being with you in person -- whether it is for the very first time or the five hundredth time. As you know (or will discover), we take great joy in learning about and supporting one another through worship, fellowship, and service. We believe the greatest,…
data.text:
By the grace of Jesus Christ, reconciling people to God and to one another.

When coming to a new place, especially a church, there are a few things you might be wondering. GraceCity is…

Casual

Come as you are and be comfortable.

Welcoming

Every fourth Sunday, we have a newcomers meeting to greet you, answer questions, and show you around. And we are family friendly. From babies in the nursery to elementary programs, families are welcome.

Contemporary

Our style, music, and building reflect where we live and who we are in the heart of the city.

Relevant The teaching is from God’s Word and applicable to your everyday life.

Committed to making a difference

We want to be a light in our city and around the world.

Committed to Jesus

Join us and experience a relationship with the Creator of the universe.

Here’s what’s happening this month!

At GraceCity, your generosity makes a huge difference.

To begin with, your gifts fund our mission arenas in education, human trafficking, people living with HIV, and our partnerships in Nicaragua. We allocate an unusually large percentage of our budget to these arenas, and we hope you are pleased to give toward mature and effective missions that feed 800 children daily in Managua, provide a fully funded after school program for 20+ children enrolled in SHARPkids, help train hundreds of volunteers to dismantle the human trafficking of children, and work alongside our partners at HopeSprings to help eradicate HIV in Baltimore.

Your gifts help GraceCity thrive as a church in the city. These resources create a fully staffed, compelling, and uniquely diverse ministry, building a worshipping community across all racial, ethnic, and socio-economic lines that is nearly unprecedented. The impact of a kingdom community like this is enormous.

If mailing a check please mail to: P.O. Box 41583, Baltimore, MD 21203-6583

Give to GraceCity through our church hub. Register or login below.

Click ‘Sign Up’ under the login box if this is your first time.

Click the Give menu option on the left.

Follow the menu options for a one-time or repeating gift.
